item.description:
And this would be a fun Monday night out...


Event: Acoustic Guitar & Pasta Bar
Dates: Starts on July 7th, 2008 and occurs every week on
Mondays.
Come to Zocco's on Monday, July 7 (all summer Monday nights)
for Pasta Bar and Acoustic Guitar! You'll enjoy dinner
listening to light acoustic guitar and vocal work, including
performances by local artists. Chef attended all-you-can-eat
pasta bar with everything from grilled chicken and sausage to
fresh veggies. Adults $10, Seniors $8, Kids $6

Your meal comes with your choice of San Marzana marinara,
alfredo, garlic & oil and rose sauces, limitless garlic bread
sticks and dressed romaine greens.

And Monday through Friday 2pm - 5pm come for our early bird
specials!

Zocco's
555 Day Hill Rd, Windsor
860-285-0031

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Pasta and Acoustic Guitar
